named-query.name: BusRuleEntity.FETCH_ALL_BY_STATUS
named-query.query: From BusRuleEntity br where br.softDelete = :softDelete and br.statusLk.name = :status

named-query.name: BusRulePriorityEntity.FETCH_ALL_ORDER_BY_PRIORITY
named-query.query: From BusRulePriorityEntity brp where brp.softDelete = :softDelete and brp.busRule.statusLk.name = :status order by brp.priority desc

named-query.name: BusRuleEntity.FETCH_ALL_ORDER_BY_FILE_NAME
named-query.query: From BusRuleEntity br where br.softDelete = :softDelete order by br.ruleFileName
